mapper.insert: insert into tbl_InstallDetail ( inDe_ParentId, inDe_ProductId, inDe_ProductName, inDe_Price, inDe_Quantity, inDe_TotalAmount, inDe_Createdate, inDe_Updatedate, inDe_ProductCode, inDe_InstallationAddress, inDe_InstallationPerson, inDe_LnstallationTel )values ( #{indeParentid}, #{indeProductid}, #{indeProductname}, #{indePrice}, #{indeQuantity}, #{indeTotalamount}, #{indeCreatedate}, #{indeUpdatedate}, #{indeProductcode}, #{indeInstallationaddress}, #{indeInstallationperson}, #{indeLnstallationtel} )
mapper.update: update tbl_InstallDetail set inDe_ParentId=#{indeParentid}, inDe_ProductId=#{indeProductid}, inDe_ProductName=#{indeProductname}, inDe_Price=#{indePrice}, inDe_Quantity=#{indeQuantity}, inDe_TotalAmount=#{indeTotalamount}, inDe_Createdate=#{indeCreatedate}, inDe_Updatedate=#{indeUpdatedate}, inDe_ProductCode=#{indeProductcode} where pk_InstallDetail=#{pkInstalldetail}
mapper.select: select pk_InstallDetail, inDe_ParentId, inDe_ProductId, inDe_ProductName, inDe_Price, inDe_Quantity, inDe_TotalAmount, inDe_Createdate, inDe_Updatedate, inDe_ProductCode from tbl_InstallDetail where pk_InstallDetail=#{pkInstalldetail}

select pk_InstallDetail, inDe_ParentId, inDe_ProductId, inDe_ProductName, inDe_Price, inDe_Quantity, inDe_TotalAmount, inDe_Createdate, inDe_Updatedate, inDe_ProductCode from tbl_InstallDetail where pk_InstallDetail=#{pkInstalldetail}
